articles.author: Henry Foy, Alice Hancock, Paola Tamma, Daria Mosolova, Andy Bounds, Laura Dubois
articles.title: EU leaders endorse second term for Ursula von der Leyen as bloc's top official - Financial Times
articles.description: But European Commission president fails to secure the backing of Italy
articles.content:
EU leaders have endorsed a second five-year term for Ursula von der Leyen as European Commission president, although she failed to win the backing of Italy, the blocs third-largest member state.

articles.title: ‘Planet Killer’ asteroid to fly close by Earth, How to watch it live? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Asteroid 2011 UL21 is larger than 99 per cent of known near-Earth asteroids, according to the European Space Agency
articles.content: A mountain-sized space rock is set to fly past Earth on Thursday, June 27. Dubbed the Planet Killer, 2011 UL21 will be one of the closest asteroids to approach the Blue Planet. The asteroid is estima… [+1779 chars]
